content: I like the piece. I wish you had included a piece within it something more clear about the process we all take in our evolution (2 steps forward, blah, blah), because there is no progress in thinking or action without failing. We err with each day we live. Aging allows us to see results & recognize mistakes or design failures made by our good intentions. It is all time dependent if we are all willing to learn. However, at times, our concept is either too far ahead in the chess game for the audience’s solution space or the audience changed due to a parallel event in a discipline we never saw coming.
